Introduction

Welcome to DataHive.co.in, operated by DataHive . These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services, including lead generation, customer nurturing strategies, and access to our premium 100 cr database for trading and sales leads. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

Services

DataHive provides premium data solutions, including:

  • Bespoke lead generation and lead prospecting services.
  • Customer nurturing strategies to convert leads into customers.
  • Access to a 100 cr database for B2B online lead generation and trading leads.
  • CRM lead-to-opportunity processes and client follow-up systems.

We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at our discretion without prior notice.

Refund Policy

We offer refunds at our sole discretion under the following conditions:

  • Refunds may be requested within 7 days of purchase if the service does not meet the promised standards (e.g., lead quality, database access issues).
  • Upon approval, refunds will be processed within 5 to 7 business days via the original payment method through Razorpay.
  • If funds are deducted despite a failed transaction, they will be automatically refunded by your bank within 5 to 7 business days. Contact your bank or Razorpay support if you do not receive the refund within this period.

For refund requests, please contact us at support@datahive.co.in with your transaction details.
